items.sentence: It would\'ve been nice if you\'d helped me a little.
I think Tom might actually want someone to kill him.
Tom and Mary admired the scenery as they held hands.
I want to be able to play the violin as well as Tom.
If it is worth doing at all, it is worth doing well.
Is there anything you want us to send you from home?
Tom said it was all perfectly normal, but it isn\'t.
Tom said that he didn\'t know what Mary looked like.
Tom said that he didn\'t want to eat dinner tonight.
My problem is I love Mary, but she doesn\'t love me.
I have just been to the station to see my uncle off.
You don\'t plan to stay in Boston very long, do you?
I\'ve already told Tom I don\'t know how to do that.
I\'ve already told Tom I don\'t want him to do that.
Don\'t you think it\'s strange that Tom isn\'t here?
Tom doesn\'t need to do that if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom\'s idiosyncrasies take a bit of getting used to.
Tom\'s talents could be put to better use elsewhere.
Tom thought that Mary wouldn\'t like Malaysian food.
Let\'s not do anything that might get us in trouble.
